title: Barbacoa sin fronteras (Barbacoa Beyond Borders)
itunes:title: Barbacoa sin fronteras (Barbacoa Beyond Borders)
description:
After fleeing her hometown of Capulhuac, México, Cristina Martínez starts all over in Philadelphia, where she rises to fame as a barbacoa chef.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/35xJz9v.
